name: Keri
description:
Keri is a skill-based pixel Platformer in which you have to reach the last room. On the way there you'll have to overcome obstacles such as spikes, so that you can fulfill your destiny in the last room, sacrificing yourself for the light of the world.

Feedback or opinions on the game are greatly appreciated.

This Game is my first semester project for the htk academy. 

Special thanks to all my university teachers who helped me with the creation of this game.
